# Nowy Folwark, Silesian Voivodeship

Nowy Folwark  is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Miedźno, within Kłobuck County, Silesian Voivodeship, in southern Poland. It lies approximately  north-east of Kłobuck and  north of the regional capital Katowice.
